name: Out of Ctrl (AnitaGZ)
description:
Originally made for GMTK Out of Control Jam.

Evade the boss and wreak havoc on your workplace! 

Go near the PCs, and click on them to interact. Try to create as much CHAOS as you can!

Dev - Alice Cheng, Diego Chiodini, Anita Ghoddoomi-Zadeh
Art - Jaz Woodroffe
Music - Aria Ghoddoomi-Zadeh

Icons made by iconixar from www.flaticon.com
